The WssTP is a growing organisation 
serving a challenging mission which 
aims to develop collaboration 
between the different stakeholders 
working in the water sector. 
WssTP cooperates with SPIRE, K4I, other ETPs and trade associations. 
WssTP counts currently more than 20 strategic partenrs belogning to the European Water Sector. http://wsstp.eu/communities/partners/
goals__remit:
Our Goals: 
1)Improve coordination and collaboration in the water and allied sectors on RTD&I; 
2)Enhance competitiveness of the European water and allied sectors; 
3)Contribute to solving societal challenges through RTD&I 
 
 
The mission and related goals of WssTP are to strengthen the competitiveness and the potential for: 
 
1. Technological leadership by the European Water Industry. 
 
2. Solving European water issues. 
 
3. Addressing the challenges of an integrated and sustainable mangement of water ressources. 
- Increased water stress and costs. 
- Increasing urbanisation 
- Rapid climate change 
- Under-resourced rural areas
relevant_communication:
    Organise on a regular basis a number of brokerage events, workshops and info-days that foster networking and collaboration in the water sector. 
    Organise the annual stakeholders’ event ‘Water Innovation Europe’ that offers an open platform for discussion and networking among key stakeholders. 
    Publish monthly external and internal newsletters, as well as press releases and newsflashes to provide WssTP members and water professionals with the all the latest insights of its activities. 
    Publish scientific reports that put forward clear recommendations for Research and Technology development and Innovation within the European water sector. 
    Participate to project consortia for communication and dissemination of project activities and results.
